btrplace.solver.choco.view

Class SolverViewsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • btrplace.solver.choco.view.SolverViewsManager

  • public class SolverViewsManager
extends Object
    A tool to manage views according to their dependencies.
    Author:
    Fabien Hermenier

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SolverViewsManager(ReconfigurationProblem p)
      New manager.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean add(ChocoView v)
      Add a view. the view identifier must not be already known.
      boolean beforeSolve()
      Call ChocoView.beforeSolve(btrplace.solver.choco.ReconfigurationProblem) on each of the views in the reverse order of their dependencies.
      void build(List<SolverViewBuilder> vs)
      Build all the constraints.
      void cloneVM(VM vm, VM newVM)
      Call ChocoView.cloneVM(btrplace.model.VM, btrplace.model.VM) on each of the views in the order of their dependencies.
      ChocoView get(String id)
      Get a view.
      Set<String> getKeys()
      Get all the views keys.
      boolean insertActions(ReconfigurationPlan p)
      Call ChocoView.insertActions(btrplace.solver.choco.ReconfigurationProblem, btrplace.plan.ReconfigurationPlan) on each of the views in the order of their dependencies.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SolverViewsManager

        public SolverViewsManager(ReconfigurationProblem p)
        New manager.
        Parameters:
        p - the problem to consider

    • Method Detail

      • build

        public void build(List<SolverViewBuilder> vs)
           throws SolverException
        Build all the constraints. The building is done according to the dependencies between the constraints.
        Parameters:
        vs - the builders to call
        Throws:
        SolverException - if an error occurred while building a constraint or if there is a cycle of dependencies.

      • beforeSolve

        public boolean beforeSolve()
                    throws SolverException
        Call ChocoView.beforeSolve(btrplace.solver.choco.ReconfigurationProblem) on each of the views in the reverse order of their dependencies.
        Returns:
        false if it is sure the problem does not have a solution
        Throws:
        SolverException - if an error occurred

      • insertActions

        public boolean insertActions(ReconfigurationPlan p)
                      throws SolverException
        Call ChocoView.insertActions(btrplace.solver.choco.ReconfigurationProblem, btrplace.plan.ReconfigurationPlan) on each of the views in the order of their dependencies.
        Returns:
        true
        Throws:
        SolverException - if an error occurred

      • cloneVM

        public void cloneVM(VM vm,
                    VM newVM)
        Call ChocoView.cloneVM(btrplace.model.VM, btrplace.model.VM) on each of the views in the order of their dependencies.
        Parameters:
        vm - the old VM identifier
        newVM - the new VM identifier

      • add

        public boolean add(ChocoView v)
        Add a view. the view identifier must not be already known.
        Parameters:
        v - the view to add.
        Returns:
        true if the view has been added. false otherwise

      • getKeys

        public Set<String> getKeys()
        Get all the views keys.
        Returns:
        a set that can be empty.

      • get

        public ChocoView get(String id)
        Get a view.
        Parameters:
        id - the view identifier.
        Returns:
        the associated view if exists, null otherwise
